# My Personal Blog Source File

---

## The Template Of Markdown File For HtmlOS Blog

```markdown
<!-- title: -->
<!-- created: -->
<!-- updated: -->
<!-- categories: template, readme -->
<!-- tags: readme, template -->

# Title

> Summary1
> Summary2
> Summary3

![alt](/favicon.ico)
![alt](./not.exsit.png)

<!-- more -->

<!-- iframe 
<iframe
    ...
</iframe>
 -->


![alt](http://host.domain/blog/images/cover.png)

```
